data.eml:eml: Two new species of Biantes from China and Malaysia (Opiliones: Laniatores: Biantidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gong, Xuyun, Martens, Jochen, Zhang, Chao (2018): Two new species of Biantes from China and Malaysia (Opiliones: Laniatores: Biantidae). Zootaxa 4461 (4): 587-599, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4461.4.8
